title:
DIRECTIONS In a large bowl, whisk together the milk and dry pudding mix.
Let the pudding mix set up for about 3 minutes, then use a rubber spatula to fold in the whipped topping.
Add in apples and Snickers. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Before serving, drizzle with salted caramel sauce (if using).
INFORMATION Category Desserts, Puddings/Mousse Yield Serves 12 Cook Time 10 minutes
directions: In a large bowl, whisk together the milk and dry pudding mix.
Let the pudding mix set up for about 3 minutes, then use a rubber spatula to fold in the whipped topping.
Add in apples and Snickers. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
Before serving, drizzle with salted caramel sauce (if using).
Category Desserts, Puddings/Mousse Yield Serves 12 Cook Time 10 minutes
ingredients: 1 8-ounce tub of frozen whipped topping (Cool Whip)
4 full-size Snickers candy bars, chopped into bite-size pieces
